text: Python and object/class attrs - what's going on?
Can someone explain why Python does the following?

code:
>>> class Foo(object):
...   bar = []
...
>>> a = Foo()
>>> b = Foo()
>>> a.bar.append(1)
>>> b.bar
[1]
>>> a.bar = 1
>>> a.bar
1
>>> b.bar
[1]
>>> a.bar = []
>>> a.bar
[]
>>> b.bar
[1]
>>> del a.bar
>>> a.bar
[1]
